Hey Simon, I see why you asked. I’m not a Queen B fan, although I know she is well loved by her audiences. So it seems there is much debate on whether she writes her own songs. I see her credited on many of her songs. I also see the participation by other writers being hashed about. Here’s my take on what I just read about the subject. She’s obviously an extremely talented artist. Whether she writes her songs or just ‘has a hand’ in writing them isn’t what would be important to me. This sounds like music critics trying to tear her down. Not cool, not necessary. I say enjoy her music and move on. If her music moves you, enjoy it, enjoy her talent. Thanks for asking, Simon! Deb
